players.name: Alice
memory:
Bob: "I am the detective and I found Alice to be the mafioso. 
I will vote for Charlie as he seems suspicious."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, as he was acting suspiciously."
Bob: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I will continue to monitor Charlie's actions as he seemed suspicious last night."
Charlie: "Let's all keep an eye on Charlie, as he was acting suspiciously last night. We need to gather more information before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
